# Phase Goal: 001_PLAN


## Phase Objective
Define comprehensive requirements and design the technical architecture for the todo app MVP.

## Success Criteria
- [ ] **Requirements Complete**: All core features documented with acceptance criteria
- [ ] **Architecture Designed**: Technical architecture and data model finalized
- [ ] **Risks Identified**: All technical risks documented with mitigation plans

## Key Deliverables
| Deliverable | Description | Acceptance Criteria |
|-------------|-------------|---------------------|
| Requirements Doc | Complete feature and technical requirements | All stakeholders reviewed and approved |
| Architecture Design | System architecture and data model | Technical team reviewed, no major concerns |

## Progress Tracking
- **Current Status**: Not started
- **Blockers**: None
- **Next Milestone**: Complete requirements gathering
